keyMoments.title: Jinbe Volunteers to Join Luffy's Escape Team
keyMoments.description: Jinbe requests to join Luffy's team to prevent the war between Whitebeard and the Marines, revealing his connection to Ace and willingness to die for the cause.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Jinbe's alliance with Luffy that will eventually lead to him joining the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: I want to save Ace as badly as you do, even if it means dying a glorious death!

keyMoments.title: Debuts Karakusagawara Seiken
keyMoments.description: Jinbe demonstrates his Fish-Man Karate technique, sending guards flying with a delayed shock wave transmitted through water vapor.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Jinbe's formidable Fish-Man Karate abilities, showcasing his power as a fighter.

abilities.description: A Fish-Man Karate technique where Jinbe punches from a distance, transmitting force through water vapor to create a delayed shock wave that sends opponents flying.

relationships.description: Jinbe allies with Luffy to save Ace and prevent the war.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe volunteers to join Luffy's escape team from Impel Down.

relationships.description: Jinbe has a connection with Ace and is willing to risk his life to save him.

reveals.information: Wants to prevent the war between Whitebeard and the Marines
Has a connection to Ace and wants to save him

keyMoments.title: Ivankov Reveals Knowledge of Crocodile's Weakness
keyMoments.description: Emporio Ivankov threatens Crocodile with knowledge of a secret weakness from his past, forcing him to cooperate with Luffy's team.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a mysterious past connection between Ivankov and Crocodile that remains unexplained.

keyMoments.title: Joins the Ultimate Team
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reluctantly becomes part of the five-member escape team led by Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Former antagonist becomes a temporary ally, showcasing the desperate nature of the prison break.

keyMoments.title: Recruits Mr. 1 from Level 4
keyMoments.description: Crocodile finds and frees his former subordinate Daz Bonez (Mr. 1) from his cell on Level 4, with Mr. 1 immediately agreeing to follow him again.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites Crocodile with his most loyal agent, adding another powerful fighter to the escape.
keyMoments.quote: Mr. 1, would you like to join me in the New World?

relationships.description: Ivankov knows a secret weakness from Crocodile's past and uses it as leverage.

evolutionMoments.description: Ivankov threatens to reveal Crocodile's weakness if he doesn't cooperate.

relationships.description: Daz Bonez was Crocodile's right-hand man in Baroque Works and remains fiercely loyal.

evolutionMoments.description: Crocodile recruits Mr. 1 to join him in the New World.

reveals.information: Has a secret weakness from his past that Ivankov knows about

keyMoments.title: Recruited by Crocodile from Level 4
keyMoments.description: Crocodile finds Mr. 1 imprisoned in Level 4 and offers to free him. Mr. 1 immediately agrees to rejoin Crocodile.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Mr. 1's unwavering loyalty to Crocodile despite their defeat and imprisonment.

bounties.reason: Bounty as a member of Baroque Works

relationships.description: Daz Bonez is fiercely loyal to Crocodile and immediately agrees to follow him again.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 1 is freed by Crocodile and rejoins him without hesitation.

reveals.information: Was imprisoned in Impel Down Level 4 (Blazing Hell)
Remains completely loyal to Crocodile despite their defeat

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Reveals Knowledge of Crocodile's Weakness
keyMoments.description: Ivankov threatens Crocodile with knowledge of a secret weakness, forcing him to cooperate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ivankov's past connection with Crocodile and his leverage over the former Warlord.
keyMoments.quote: I know your weakness, Crocodile. You wouldn't want that getting out, would you?

keyMoments.title: Leads the Ultimate Team Formation
keyMoments.description: Ivankov helps form and lead the five-member escape team consisting of himself, Luffy, Inazuma, Crocodile, and Jinbe.
keyMoments.significance: Serves as the glue holding together an unlikely alliance of pirates and revolutionaries.

relationships.description: Knows Crocodile from his rookie days and holds leverage over him with knowledge of his weakness.

evolutionMoments.description: Uses knowledge of Crocodile's weakness to keep him in line.

reveals.information: Knows a secret weakness about Crocodile from when he was a rookie

keyMoments.title: Forms the Ultimate Team
keyMoments.description: Luffy accepts both Crocodile and Jinbe into his escape team despite his reservations about working with his former enemy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's pragmatism and determination to save Ace at any cost.

keyMoments.title: Uses Gomu Gomu no Ame
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates his rapid-fire spinning punch technique against multiple guards.
keyMoments.significance: Shows one of Luffy's crowd-control techniques.

abilities.description: Luffy jumps into the air and performs a rapid-fire spinning punch attack.

relationships.description: Accepts Jinbe's offer to help save Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy welcomes Jinbe to the escape team.

relationships.description: Reluctantly works with his former enemy to escape Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Accepts Crocodile into the team under Ivankov's assurance.

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Luffy's Team
keyMoments.description: Bentham and the Newkama forces reunite with Luffy's escape team on Level 5.
keyMoments.significance: Adds the Newkama army to the escape effort, significantly increasing their forces.

bounties.reason: Bounty as a member of Baroque Works
